message:
liftjson was ok to a point, but i get completely stuck with reading objects from a json array I parsed. Stuff like this doesn't add up at all:
 getid(h2(0)) makes JsonAST.JValue = JField(_id,JString(abc))
vs
h2.map(getid) makes JsonAST.JValue = JArray(List(JField(_id,JNothing), JField(_id,JNothing), JField(_id,JNothing)))
where are the strings? Why does everything have to be buried in JArray(List(JObject(List(JField(... ?
